simulation.agent

Interface Listener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Agent, VariantAgent, WeightedLexiconAgent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SuccessCountingAgent, TotalListener, TotalSpeaker

    public interface Listener
    An interface providing all methods expected to be defined for different kinds of listeners in naming games in computer models of language evolution.
    See Also:
    Speaker, Agent, InteractionRunner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acquire(Thing thing, Word word)
      Implements this listener's acquisition of the given word in connection with the given thing.
      void loss(Thing thing, Word word)
      Implements this listener's behaviour after a loss in a naming-game based interaction.
      boolean recognized(Thing thing, Word word)
      Returns true if this listener recognizes the specified word in connection with the given thing.
      void success(Thing thing, Word word)
      Implements this listener's behaviour after a success in a naming-game based interaction.

    • Method Detail

      • success

        void success(Thing thing,
             Word word)
        Implements this listener's behaviour after a success in a naming-game based interaction.
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing which was a topic of the interaction
        word - a word which was communicated of the interaction

      • loss

        void loss(Thing thing,
          Word word)
        Implements this listener's behaviour after a loss in a naming-game based interaction.
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing which was a topic of the interaction
        word - a word which was communicated of the interaction

      • recognized

        boolean recognized(Thing thing,
                   Word word)
        Returns true if this listener recognizes the specified word in connection with the given thing.
        Parameters:
        thing - A thing to be checked for recognition in connection with the specified word.
        word - A word to be checked for recognition in connection with the specified thing.
        Returns:
        true if this listener recognizes the specified word in connection with the specified thing.

      • acquire

        void acquire(Thing thing,
             Word word)
        Implements this listener's acquisition of the given word in connection with the given thing.
        Parameters:
        thing - A thing denoted by the specified word
        word - A word denoting the specified thing
